title: Twelve Days: Party with a Purpose - Sixth Annual Cocktail Party
desc: It's the most wonderful time of the year and that means it?s time to  Party with a Purpose  at the 6th Annual Holiday Cocktail Party, hosted by the ladies of the Twelve Days of Christmas, Inc. As always, 100% of your ticket will go?directly to families all across New York City?to fill their?Christmas Wishlist.? ? Enjoy great company, mingle with  20  hostesses in holiday flair, and dance the night away to music by Tiff McFierce.  We?ll see you at The Attic, 251 West 48th St., from  6:00pm-10:00 p.m., on Monday December 7th.
